mapper.select: SELECT FAQ_IDX, FAQ_QUESTION, FAQ_ANSWER, TO_CHAR(FAQ_REG_DATE,'YY-DD-MM') FAQ_REG_DATE FROM FAQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ (FAQ_QUESTION, FAQ_ANSWER) VALUES(#{ faq_question }, #{ faq_answer })
mapper.select: SELECT CS_IDX, EMAIL, CS_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CS_REG_DATE,'YY-MM-DD') CS_REG_DATE, CS_STATE FROM CS_CENTER ORDER BY CS_STATE DESC, CS_IDX DESC OFFSET #{arg0} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{arg1} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE CS_CENTER SET CS_REPLY = #{ cs_answer }, CS_STATE = 1 WHERE CS_IDX = #{ cs_idx }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CS_CENTER(EMAIL, CS_TITLE, CS_CONTENT, CS_STATE) VALUES( #{ email }, #{ cs_title }, #{ cs_content }, 2)
